text: Jeckster Apinan is a Filipino professional player for the Makati Super Crunch of the Maharlika Pilipinas Basketball League (MPBL). He was born and raised in Roxas City, Capiz. He played college ball for JRU Heavy Bombers before entering the Philippine Basketball Association. ==References== Category:1987 births Category:José Rizal University alumni Category:Filipino men's basketball players Category:Maharlika Pilipinas Basketball League players Category:People from Capiz Category:Living people Category:NLEX Road Warriors players Category:Terrafirma Dyip players Category:Small forwards Category:JRU Heavy Bombers men's basketball players
title: Jeckster Apinan
